Reviews.Title: perfect kids phone
Reviews.Author: alberta forbes
Reviews.Content: This watch phone is so nice.  The picture and video quality are just ok, but buying a cheap unlocked phone my son can't lose has been priceless.  It's waterproof as well and came with an extra battery.  He gets so many compliments on it.  It makes him so proud.

Reviews.Title: Good watch phone!!!
Reviews.Author: Sensei
Reviews.Content: The watch phone is good!  Eliminates the inconvenience of having to carry around more than one phone, at least for me.  This was one of the reasons why I bought it.  Voice calls are clear.  It comes with an earphone.  After sometime it no longer worked.  With voice calls that take long I find my hand hurting!  One other advantage: it is water proof. I do not have to remove it before washing my hands.

Reviews.Title: fun to have
Reviews.Author: luis madera
Reviews.Content: its a great phone watch, still working on some settings but i'll get there,i recommend it you'll enjoy it bye,
